V.iv.1.C.5.b
.
Identifying Disabilities for Which Combat-Related Disability Severance Pay Was Awarded
When awarding service connection (SC) for disabilities that were incurred in a combat zone, or during the performance of duty in combat-related operations, and resulted in an award of disability severance pay, as discussed in
M21-1, Part VI, Subpart ii, 2.3.e and f
, identify each such disability by selecting
Enhanced Disability Severance Pay
from the SPECIAL ISSUE INFORMATION drop-down menu in VBMS-R.
